Interesting things

Data ethics in practice with reveal.js

November 27, 2020

I had a great opportunity to talk about data ethics in practice at the ScotSoft2020 conference. I decided this would be the perfect opportunity to try out the amazing reveal.js html presentation framework.

Mapping my skills development with a radar chart

October 23, 2020

I’ve recently added the radarChart() function into my basicPlotteR R package. Radar Charts provide a way that we can map scores in different qualitative categories.

Using python's googletrans library in R

September 5, 2020

I’ve recently been exploring a survey dataset that is in French. I found a python library googletrans that uses the Google Translate Ajax API to translate text.
